sentences.english: No. 10, Xinyuan Village, Laodaohe Town, Kaifu District, Changsha City.
sentences.chinese: 长沙市开福区老刀河镇新源村10号。

sentences.english: I live in eastern part of Changsha City.
sentences.chinese: 我居住在长沙市的东区。

sentences.english: Changsha City has decided to build an archaeological site park based on this mausoleum.
sentences.chinese: 长沙市已决定建设汉长沙国王陵考古遗址公园。

sentences.english: Furong District is located in Changsha, the capital city of Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉区位于湖南省省会长沙市。

sentences.english: Chutian is one of key backbone enterprise of Changsha city.
sentences.chinese: 楚天是长沙市的骨干企业之一。

sentences.english: Obstetrics and Gynecology, director of the First Hospital of Changsha Professor Yang Suan said.
sentences.chinese: 长沙市第一医院妇产科主任杨苏安教授说。

sentences.english: Changsha city is one of the severest polluted cities by acid rain in Central-south China.
sentences.chinese: 长沙市是中南地区酸雨污染最为严重的城市之一。

sentences.english: Chief of Marketing Department of Changsha City Bureau of Culture Guan Jianzhi told the reporter.
sentences.chinese: 长沙市文化局市场处处长关建之说。

sentences.english: I come from Changsha No. 1 Middle School.
sentences.chinese: 我来自长沙市第一中学。

sentences.english: Excavated from Tomb 1 at Mawangdui, Changsha city, Hunan province in 1972.
sentences.chinese: 1972年湖南省长沙市马王堆一号汉墓出土。

sentences.english: Chen Zehui, director of the Publicity Department of the CPC Changsha Municipal Committee, attended the opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 长沙市宣传部长陈泽珲出席开幕式。

sentences.english: He lives at 75 Xiangchun Road, Changsha.
sentences.chinese: 他住在长沙市湘春路75号。

sentences.english: Mr. Tang has pledged to come from Changsha City.
sentences.chinese: 唐晓瑾先生已经承诺从湖南省长沙市过来。

sentences.english: Xiangjiang River within Changsha is approx. 80 km in length.
sentences.chinese: 湘江在长沙市域内的长度约80公里。

sentences.english: In five area of Changsha City, modern service industry in Yuelu district is in the state falling behind.
sentences.chinese: 在长沙市五区中，岳麓区现代服务业处于落后状态。

sentences.english: This precious photo, now also on display in Changsha City Zhou Nan School.
sentences.chinese: 这张珍贵的照片，如今还陈列在长沙市周南中学。
